snippet: A California appellate court has found that the judge in the retrial of Erik and Lyle Menendez did not err in his rulings, ending any plans by the Beverly Hills brothers for a new trial.    The Second District Court of Appeal affirmed on Friday th...
lead_paragraph: A California appellate court has found that the judge in the retrial of Erik and Lyle Menendez did not err in his rulings, ending any plans by the Beverly Hills brothers for a new trial. The Second District Court of Appeal affirmed on Friday the handling of the 1996 trial by Judge Stanley Weisberg of Superior Court.
abstract: California appellate court finds that Superior Court Judge Stanley Weisberg did not err in his rulings in retrial of Erik And Lyle Menendez; they had appealed their 1996 murder conviction for fatally shooting their parents, Jose and Kitty Menendez (S)9

headline.main: National News Briefs; Menendez Brothers Lose Bid for a New Trial
